member.name: F:MPT.Cursors.WaitCursor._isActive
member.summary: True: Wait cursor is currently active.

member.name: M:MPT.Cursors.WaitCursor.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.param: True: Wait cursor will begin upon class initialization.

member.name: M:MPT.Cursors.WaitCursor.StartCursor
member.summary: Starts the wait cursor if one is not currently set. This status is recorded in the class.

member.name: M:MPT.Cursors.WaitCursor.EndCursor
member.summary: If the class has started a wait cursor, the class will then end it.

member.name: M:MPT.Cursors.WaitCursor.waitCursorIsActive
member.summary: True: Wait cursor is running or set to be running in the current class.

member.name: T:MPT.Cursors.WaitCursor
member.summary: Cursor that appears over a segment of time determined by toggling the cursor on or off.

member.name: P:MPT.Cursors.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MPT.Cursors.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:MPT.Cursors.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
